alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 136 PM EDT/1236 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blountstown, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Red Oak, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Chason, Chipola, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Willis, Nettle Ridge, Frink, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek, Durham, White Pond and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
